subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Steve Nash had 21 points and 14 assists as the Phoenix Suns overcame an early 15-point deficit to win their 11th consecutive game, beating the host Houston Rockets, 100-91, last night.
snippet: Steve Nash had 21 points and 14 assists as the Phoenix Suns overcame an early 15-point deficit to win their 11th consecutive game, beating the host Houston Rockets, 100-91, last night.
